q6-1-cm-locator.title: Centre of Mass Locator
q6-1-cm-locator.description: Visualize the center of mass for various uniform bodies and see if it lies inside or outside the material.

q6-3-child-trolley.title: Internal Forces & CM Velocity
q6-3-child-trolley.description: Observe how the motion of a child on a trolley affects (or doesn't affect) the velocity of the system's Center of Mass.

q6-10-rotational-race.title: Torque & Angular Acceleration
q6-10-rotational-race.description: Compare how equal torques affect the angular speed of a Hollow Cylinder vs. a Solid Sphere.
